00067 ConnectionHandler::ConnectionHandler(Comm *comm, ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue, RangeServerPtr range_server, MasterClientPtr &master_client) : m_comm(comm), m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue), m_range_server_ptr(range_server), m_master_client_ptr(master_client), m_shutdown(false) {
00068   return;

00082 void ConnectionHandler::handle(EventPtr &event) {
00083   int command = -1;
00084 
00085   if (m_shutdown)
00086     return;
00087 
00088   if (event->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00089     ApplicationHandler *handler = 0;
00090     const uint8_t *msg = event->message;
00091     size_t remain = event->message_len;
00092 
00093     //event->display();
00094 
00095     try {
00096       command = decode_i16(&msg, &remain);
00097 
00098       // sanity check command code
00099       if (command < 0 || command >= RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_MAX)
00100         HT_THROWF(PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Invalid command (%d)", command);
00101 
00102       switch (command) {
00103       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_COMPACT:
00104         handler = new RequestHandlerCompact(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00105         break;
00106       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_LOAD_RANGE:
00107         handler = new RequestHandlerLoadRange(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00108         break;
00109       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_UPDATE:
00110         handler = new RequestHandlerUpdate(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00111         break;
00112       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_CREATE_SCANNER:
00113         handler = new RequestHandlerCreateScanner(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00114         break;
00115       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_DESTROY_SCANNER:
00116         handler = new RequestHandlerDestroyScanner(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00117         break;
00118       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_FETCH_SCANBLOCK:
00119         handler = new RequestHandlerFetchScanblock(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00120         break;
00121       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_DROP_TABLE:
00122         handler = new RequestHandlerDropTable(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00123         break;
00124       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_REPLAY_BEGIN:
00125         handler = new RequestHandlerReplayBegin(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00126         break;
00127       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_REPLAY_LOAD_RANGE:
00128         handler = new RequestHandlerReplayLoadRange(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00129         break;
00130       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_REPLAY_UPDATE:
00131         handler = new RequestHandlerReplayUpdate(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00132         break;
00133       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_REPLAY_COMMIT:
00134         handler = new RequestHandlerReplayCommit(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00135         break;
00136       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_DROP_RANGE:
00137         handler = new RequestHandlerDropRange(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00138         break;
00139       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_STATUS:
00140         handler = new RequestHandlerStatus(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00141         break;
00142       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_SHUTDOWN:
00143         m_shutdown = true;
00144         handler = new RequestHandlerShutdown(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00145         break;
00146       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_DUMP_STATS:
00147         handler = new RequestHandlerDumpStats(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00148         break;
00149       default:
00150         HT_THROWF(PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Unimplemented command (%d)", command);
00151       }
00152       m_app_queue_ptr->add(handler);
00153     }
00154     catch (Exception &e) {
00155       ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, event);
00156       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00157       std::string errmsg = format("%s - %s", e.what(), get_text(e.code()));
00158       cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, errmsg);
00159     }
00160   }
00161   else if (event->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00162 
00163     HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00164 
00169     if (m_master_client_ptr)
00170       m_app_queue_ptr->add(new EventHandlerMasterConnection(m_master_client_ptr, m_range_server_ptr->get_location(), event));
00171   }
00172   else {
00173     HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00174   }
00175 
00176 }
